job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Staffing and Recruiting
job.description: pAn award winning Austin based organization are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Engineer join their growing team of experienced Data professionals The company offer a talent platform that helps companies to be matched with skilled workers The right candidate is likely to have 3 years commercial experience as well as a strong academic background from a top UniversityppbrppRequired skills amp experiencepullistrongEducated to Bachelors degree in Computer Science Essential Top 50 Universitystronglili3 years commercial experience in ML or Data Science positionliliExtensive Machine Learning experienceliliExperience with Big Data technologiesliliProgramming Python SQL Scala JavaliulpbrppThe client is not currently in a position to sponsor or transfer visas so please only apply if you have full rights to work in the US without restrictionp
